links.title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Analysis - Dividend Value Builder
links.description: Apple's iPhone and iOS operating system are known for their quality, security, and integration abilities. These are the backbone of a successful product lineup and have given Apple the ability to obtain premium prices (high profit margins) for their favored brand. Apple has a competitive advantage because of its sheer size and ability to vertically integrate.

links.title: Saudi stocks plunge 7% on Khashoggi fallout; biggest drop since 2014
links.description: YASIN AKGUL | AFP | Getty Images Saudi Arabia's stock market plunged on Sunday as investors worried about deteriorating relations with the international community after the disappearance of Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi. After nearly two hours of trade the index was down 7.0 percent, its biggest drop since December 2014, when oil prices were crashing.
